chunk_text: #### Do you allow DRY weddings? Yes, however, No outside alcohol is permitted at WHV, unless brought by a licensed and insured bartending service. Signature cocktails and service can be offered by WHV provided that proper licensing and approval is obtained by WHV management. There will be an additional charge if WHV provides a signature cocktails. This must be approved 60 days prior to the wedding. #### Is hard alcohol allowed?
